page.title: 02TRANSPORT
page.content: Despite its rural appearance, this area is very busy and traffic flow is one of the main points to note. The A.2 Trunk road disects the area and is often congested at peak periods as commuters travel to London in the morning and return in the evening. In addition to this road are many smaller roads taking traffic into Dartford, Bexley, Crayford and Swanley, nearby settlements. The M.25 joins the A.2 near to Hawley and links through to the Dartford Tunnel. Extensive road works are being carried out at the tunnel end and Swanley end of this section which affects the traffic flow considerably. As well as private cars and caravans a great number of commercial vehicles, vans, lorries, articulated and container traffic pass through the area on route to Dover and the Continent.
